name: Reach Mars
description:
Travel as far you can within space by earning coins and upgrading your Rockt Ship! On Both Android and Windows!

Uprage your rocket ship to max, to unlock the second one.

Controls: 

  • Touch - touch joystick to rotate, 2 fingers on the screen to Boost.
  • Keyboard - A & D or Left Arrow & Right Arrow to rotate, Space to Boost. (ESC to pause).
  • Joystick - X axis to rotate, Xbox Controller: A to Boost. PS Controller: Square to Boost. (Pause - Xbox Controller: Menu Button, PS Controller: Touch Screen.)
